dcterms:description: A dataset used for demonstrating the capabilities of probabilistic logic programming systems, particularly in the context of Markov models.
dcterms:title: Markov Action Dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Sato
Y. Kameya
dcterms:description: A dataset used for modeling and inference in hidden Markov models, focusing on symbolic-statistical modeling.
dcterms:title: Hidden Markov Model

dcterms:description: A tutorial example demonstrating inference and learning in probabilistic logic programs using weighted Boolean formulas, specifically in the context of Markov chains.
dcterms:title: ProbLog Tutorial Markov Chain Example

dcterms:creator: B. Gutmann
I. Thon
A. Kimmig
M. Bruynooghe

dcterms:description: A dataset used for predicting weather conditions based on accumulated rainfall observations, demonstrating logical inference in probabilistic programming.
dcterms:title: Weather Prediction Dataset
